<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15+"
    pfs=""
>
[Robe of the Archmagi](/Equipment.aspx?ID=464)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Arcane" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=11" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 616 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn garment

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Embroidered with fine silver thread in ornate arcane patterns, these robes come in one of three colors depending on their attuned alignment. Good robes are gold, neutral robes are light blue, and evil robes are red. An [evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64) or [good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83) robe gains the appropriate trait. The robes benefit only characters who can cast [arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11) spells and whose alignment on the good-evil axis matches that of the robe. If your alignment does not match that of the robe, or you are not an arcane spellcaster, you are instead [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) while wearing a _robe of the archmagi_. This condition can't be removed in any way until you remove the robe.

 The robes are _+2 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [explorer's clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2)_, and they grant a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against arcane spells and resistance 5 to damage from arcane spells.

<document level="2" id="action-277" />

**Craft Requirements** You are an arcane spellcaster.

</column>

>
Robe of the Archmagi (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 616 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 32,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The resistance against arcane spells is 10. You can activate the robe when you or an ally within 30 feet attempts a saving throw against an arcane spell, and the robe grants either you or the ally a success on the triggering saving throw; you still can activate it only once per day.
